law.catch_line: Agent of workers' compensation self-insured group -- License required -- Appointment of agent optional.

text.section: An agent of a workersâ€™ compensation self-insured group shall be licensed as an agent with casualty line of authority in accordance with Subtitle 9 of this chapter.
Workersâ€™ compensation self-insured groups shall not be required to appoint agents.

law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 14, effective March 1, 2005.
